goal.en: This course aims to improve students’ French levels and textual analysis abilities as well as skills.
goal.ch: 持續提升同學法文能力以及對文本的分析能力。

content.en:
The course focuses primarily on French literature of
the nineteenth and twentieth centuries, especially
the short story.
content.ch: 課程內容主要聚焦於十九世紀和二十世紀法國文學，尤其是短篇小說。

textbook.en: Aymé, Marcel. Nouvelles complètes. Paris: Gallimard, 2002. Daudet, Alphonse. Lettres de mon moulin. Paris: LGF, 1972. Maupassant, Guy de. Mademoiselle Fifi. Paris: LGF, 1979. Perec, Georges. Voyages d’hiver. Paris: Seuil, 1993.
